price: 1. (Nabi Muxammadow) dheh: Waxaa la ii waxyooday inay koox Jin ahi dhegaysteen (Qur’aanka). Markaasay yidhaahdeen: Waxaanu maqallay Qur'aan cajab leh.
arabic: قُلۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسۡتَمَعَ نَفَرٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبٗا
footnotes: 1. Al-Jin: Jinka, waa nooc ka mid ah uunka uu Alle ka abuuray (aabbahood Ibliis) dab oo indhaha dadka ka qarsoon.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul ūḥiya ilayya annahu is'tamaʿa nafarun mina al-jini faqālū innā samiʿ'nā qur'ānan ʿajaban
